commands.name: kick
commands.desc: Kick Pahie out of your channel.

commands.name: dankmeme
commands.desc: Pahie sends a random dank meme.

commands.name: godeep
commands.desc: Pahie makes you think about life.

commands.name: availableaudio
commands.desc: Return a list of available audiofiles for one of Pahies soundboard-categories (currently supported: atv, spongebob, smoove).

commands.name: play
commands.desc: Pahie plays the specified audiofile (Requires Pahie to be in the same channel as you)

commands.name: signmeup
commands.desc: Enables the functionality to add your own favourite soundfiles to a personal soundboard.

commands.name: addfavourite
commands.desc: Adds a specified soundfile under the specified keyword to your personal soundboard.

commands.name: showfavourites
commands.desc: Returns a list of all currently favourited soundfiles and the keywords assigned to play them.

commands.name: deletefavourite
commands.desc: Deletes the soundfile associated with the specified keyword from your favourites list.

commands.name: fav
commands.desc: Pahie plays the soundfile that you saved under the specified keyword.
